participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and analytical, with a passion for finance and business strategy.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

content.text: Well hello there! I like to go to the mall and go to the mall

hey, what do you do at the mall

at the mall? you don't have a computer at home?
The mall is where it's at. That's good information.
